markings: '266', in blue ink, UR corner on back; 'Esther Bubley', in pencil, near top center on back; paper info label, attached to center back; 'PLEASE CREDIT/STANDARD OIL CO. (N.J.)/PHOTO BY BUBLEY', stamped in red, below label; '26633', in pencil, upside down, below stamp on back; 'PLEASE RETURN UNUSED PHOTOS TO/STANDARD OIL CO., (N.J.)/PUBLIC RELATIONS DEPT./30 ROCKEFELLER PLAZA/NEW YORK, 20, NEW YORK', stamped on back at LR corner
title: Oil Field, Tomball, Texas. James Tanner, pumper, climbing heater-treater to check water and oil level in gauge glass.  Because of the gasoline shortage, he uses horse and buggy to make his daily rounds.
